db:abstract.db:para: Shows the hierarchy of MIME types and can be used to determine the MIME type of a file.

db:mediaobject.db:alt: Screenshot of the MIME Type Browser Example

db:article.db:para: MIME Type Browser is intended to be a tool for exploring MIME types rather than an example showing the typical usage of Qt's MIME API.

db:section.db:title: Running the Example
db:section.db:para: To run the example from Qt Creator, open the Welcome mode and select the example from Examples. For more information, visit Building and Running an Example.

db:section.db:title: Main Window
db:section.db:para: The main window consists of a tree view displaying the hierarchy of MIME types based on the model MimetypeModel inheriting QStandardItemModel on the left and a QTextBrowser for showing detailed information about the selected MIME type on the right.
It has a main menu with an option File/Detect File Type, which lets you pick a file and then displays its MIME type.
For more information, see QMimeType and QMimeDatabase.
